Articles.Content:
Hello, I don\'t know the C# programming, so I just pick-up some parts and plugins that other developers did and I tried to modify little things (for example add Cephei\'s SolarPanel module to existing good looking solar panel).

I want to try a movable working solar panel, for this I have the Cephei\'s SolarPanel dll and a solar-panel part from Festivefire\'s Ceres pack which use landingleg module to unfold.

Is it possible to easily assign several modules to on part or have I to modify and recompile the source code ?

Thanks.
You\'d need to modify the SolarPanel module to extend the LandingLeg class. This should work cleanly as long as the SolarPanel class correctly calls the base event methods.
If anyone figures this out... I\'d like to know... thanks..
